City Library
============



Presidio Public Library
-----------------------

**Read or compute at the Presidio Public Library!****The City of Presidio Public Library provides free services to all residents living within the Presidio city/county boundaries with services available to all others for a fee.**

**The Presidio Public Library is located at 1200 E. O’Reilly St. Presidio, TX, 79845. Open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.**

**For more information, please call (432) 229-3317 or visit [http://presidiolibrary.org](http://presidiolibrary.org/)**

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Library-Cartoon-1024x678-1024x678.jpg)
